amendment.description: To modify the description of the economic relationship between the United States and the Republic of Korea.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4084 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4084 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S1083; text: CR S1083) To modify the description of the economic relationship between the United States and the Republic of Korea.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4084 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Biden.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4084 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
